page.title: 12Interests of Seaton People
page.content:
A questionnarire was distributed to each household in Seaton asking for information on lifestyle, leisure and activities. The following picture emerged, from the 17% returns:
{Clubs}Sailing Club, Women's Institute, Scouts, Parochial Church Council, Football Club, Round Table, Ladies' Circle. (N.B.not all in village ) {Hobbies }Sailing, reading, aerobics, squash, shooting, needlework, flower-arranging, gardening, walking, golf, rugby football, cycling. {Newspapers }Daily Telegraph, Financial Times, Sunday Observer, Daily Mail, Stamford Mercury, Sunday Times, Sunday Telegraph. {Magazines}Investors' Chronicle, Acorn Users' Guide, Good Housekeeping, Radio Times. {T.V.}10 hours average. 25% own videos.
